ItemTooltip.EmpressButterfly: If you kill this, it will happen

Achievements.DEFEAT_EMPRESS_OF_LIGHT_Description: Defeat the Empress of Rythm, responsible for kinda good music.

Bestiary_FlavorText.npc_EmpressButterfly: Should one of these luminescent bunches of symbols perish in the chaos of night or day, a sleeping tyrant is rumored to violently awaken.
Bestiary_FlavorText.npc_HallowBoss: Beneath the Hallow's cleansing blanket lies a vengeful rythm god bent on scrubbing the land of any and all impurity.
